name: The law of obscurity (WGJ211)
description:
A short metroidvania with unusual powerups in the form of "knowledge"(?)

Move with arrow keys/ASDW - The direction doesn't change when gravity does

Change gravity with SPACE key or E

This game was made for thw weekly game jam week 211 but i'm pretty sure i'll expand on it eventually. (Its also suposed to have voice acting by Bone Golem instead of text but it couldn't be done in time).

After jam to-do list:

- Voice acting
-Music
-Sound Effects
-A proper ending
-General bug fixes
-Map redesign
-Visible hazards

Possible updates if i choose to turn this into a full game

-Graphics rework
-More of a story
-More game elements
-More "levels"/larger map
-Settings
-Enemies
-One to three bosses

That's pretty vague tho.

Finally english is not my native language so feel free to correct my grammar and/or spelling.
